item.title: Flarum
item.description: What is Flarum Flarum is a free, open-source forum software based on PHP 5.5+ with a focus on simplicity. References: Flarum – Forums Made Simple Flarum 中文站：优雅简洁的轻论坛 GitHub - flarum/flarum: Delightfully simple forum software. Setup Requirements: - PHP 5.6+ <=7.1 (mbstring, pdo_mysql, openssl, json, gd, dom, fileinfo) - MySQL 5.5+ - A web server: Apache (with mod_rewrite), Nginx, or
